topic.title: Factors that management used to identify the entity’s reportable segments (paragraph 22(a))

entry.p: Diversified Company’s reportable segments are strategic business units that offer different products and services. They are managed separately because each business requires different technology and marketing strategies. Most of the businesses were acquired as individual units, and the management at the time of the acquisition was retained.
